attributes.action: Ban the use of roller skates and heelys inside public places and allow then only in public open spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children should be banned from using roller skates and heelys inside crowded public places like shopping centers airports railway stations supermarkets where someone could get hurt if hit and where staff are working up high ladders and using delivery cadges and pallet trucks wearing roller skates in a supermarket you are putting the safety of staff and public at danger some kids skate round at speed if you come out of the isle and they can't stop in time there will be a serious accident

It dose say on the box don't wear heelys inside but most kids don't read the health and safety info and just chuck it in the bin
